RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 5400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVE ME SOME CASH side by side, won bob. REAL LA JOLLA matched steps, nosed out. FIVE BAR QUICK strong bid, edged. OPEN BAR MC in tight early. BAD GIRL JESS broke inward.

ENTRY.NAME: Open Bar Mc
ENTRY.OWNER: Maltos Isidro D and Olmeda Salvador

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC DOC broke in, took off. RAGS TO RICHEZ best of rest. JJ LUCKY JESS sidestepped, good bid. JRS MAJESTIC PRINCE broke inward. HEZ A FOXX never fully fired. MISS COVID CARTEL MF forced in, chased speedster. RRREGULATOR bored in midway. IM JUSTTHATGUY shied in at break. JESS A FANCY ROSE forced in at start. PER RULING #25276 FROM THE LOUISIANA HORSE RACING COMMISSION MAGIC DOC WAS DQD FOR A POSITIVE TEST.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 300 Y Dirt CR: 80. Optional Claiming Purse 7700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
